title: 3 bedrooms 2.5 bathrooms end uint for rent in Chesterbrook
description: Welcome to Hanover Court, a terrific end unit set in a nice location within the highly sought after Springdell Village neighborhood of beautiful Chesterbrook. This bright end unit offers three sides of windows and sunlight, giving it the feel of a single family home yet with the convenience of town home living. The tiled center entrance hall with turned staircase leads to a spacious living room with wood burning fireplace and sliding glass doors to the extra-large patio area. The eat-in kitchen offers ample counter space and raised panel cabinetry. The formal dining room opens to the living room. A powder room and inside access to the one car garage completes the picture for the first level of this wonderful home. The home's upper level features a spacious master suite with walk-in closet and a nicely updated master bathroom with soaking tub and separate shower stall. Two additional nicely sized bedrooms are serviced by a tiled hall bathroom. The large basement offers tons of storage and endless possibilities. This home sits in a very nice spot within the community. The patio area is an ideal spot for outdoor grilling, entertaining and relaxing. Updated windows, new siding, lots of sunlight, great storage and closet space, upper level laundry, an open floor plan and private walkway all combine to make this a wonderful place to call home. Located in the award winning Tredyffrin-Easttown School District and close to Main Line trains and shopping.

title: Beautiful 2 bed 2 bath house in Passyunk Square
description:
Feast your eyes on this beautiful, 3-story, brick front home in the foodie neighborhood of Passyunk Square! 2 bedrooms and 2 full baths! Welcoming you inside are the 20ft ceilings and open first floor layout with a unique design! The modern, renovated kitchen features gorgeous cherry wood cabinets, recessed lighting, and stainless-steel appliances. Back door access leads to patio area perfect for your grill just off the kitchen!
There is a large unfinished basement housing the homes washer & dryer, mechanicals, and great storage space. Venture up the spiral staircase to the 2nd floor loft/bedroom overlooking the first floor, that is currently being used as a game room and also one of the full bathrooms. (The owners are willing to either leave or take the pool table).
The 2nd floor staircase leads to an open, 3rd floor bedroom with a newly renovated full bathroom and access to a roof deck with stellar center city views! Perfect for enjoying a summer date night under the stars!
Did we mention location? This home is truly near everything South Philly has to offer! The famous Pat and Geno's Steaks, Termini Bakery, all the great restaurants and bars of East Passyunk Ave., and the Italian Market, just to name a few! Also, there is the amazing dog park, Gold Star park only a ½ a block down Wharton for your furry friend and a convenience store on the corner!

title: Welcome home to The Brewery. This pristine corner penthouse nestled a
description: Welcome home to The Brewery. This pristine corner penthouse nestled atop one of Philadelphia’s most iconic former breweries was originally designed by Otto C. Wolf in 1856 to house the Bergdoll Brewing Company’s City Park Brewery, which operated there until prohibition. In the 1980s the entire complex made up of three buildings -- The Main House, (where this unit is located) The Brewery House, and The Ice House, was transformed into modern condominiums. In 2018 the current owners undertook a complete overhaul of the unit, updating every inch from top to bottom & breathing in an air of clean, effortless luxury complete with sweeping views of both the city skyline and Fairmount park. Imagine coming home to your secure, gated parking spot -hop on the elevator and up to your top-floor condo. Entering the foyer, there is a nice separation between the entry and living space by 2 generous closets. The expansive open living space offers several configuration options, anchored on a large west facing window that looks out over the treetops of Fairmount park. Just beyond, the French doors of your dreams lead to the bedroom, which is spacious, punctuated by the arced windows that beautifully highlight the original historical details of this modern oasis.

title: Sought after 2nd floor New York style loft in the converted Magdalen

description:
Great value in Fairmount!! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount acts as the idyllic foreground to 1707 Wallace St #2R. This updated 2 bed, 1.5 bath bi-level apartment sits on the top two floors of a 4-unit building. The exterior of the building features a classic red brick facade and detailed cornice trim. Inside the unit, you're greeted by a bright and open living room and dining area with soaring 9ft ceilings, tall windows, and beautiful hardwood floors. There's also a huge storage closet and a powder room. The home's kitchen is fitted with tons of cabinetry space, stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and the in-unit laundry closet. The home's second level has a spacious bedroom, with great closet space, at the front. A full bathroom and another bedroom, ideal for an office or nursery, complete this level. 1707 Wallace St's central Fairmount location is a walker's paradise, earning a WalkScore of 92. title: Enjoy modern elegance & contemporary loft living in the heart of Bella
description:
Enjoy modern elegance & contemporary loft living in the heart of Bella Vista offering 1,860 square feet of living space, 20’ ceilings, a deeded roof top deck and 2-car parking. New York City style loft with tall energy efficient windows showcasing beautiful sunsets and breathtaking views of Philadelphia. The luxurious Lofts of Bella Vista is an early 20th Century Industrial pet friendly building. This penthouse unit is one of only 2 penthouse units that include a rooftop deck. This 2 bedroom, 2 bath penthouse unit offers a mirrored floor plan with the bedrooms situated on opposite sides of an open concept kitchen/living layout. Both bedrooms provide substantial morning light, and ample closet/storage options. The kitchen and living space allow for seamless entertaining with exposed bricks & polished concrete floors throughout. Entry provides large coat closet and hall laundry room/pantry. Kitchen by Schiffini with marble countertops and waterfall marble kitchen island. Bathrooms with soaking tubs and vanities by Rifra with Zucchetti fixtures. This unit has custom design features by interior designer Michelle Gage (showcased in design blogs & multiple publications). You will experience the European flair of this completely rehabbed warehouse, which was once inhabited by Curtis Publishing Company. Enjoy 2-car heated garage parking (via parking lift), 24-hour security with front desk concierge, fitness room, a community media/meeting room with prep kitchen, secured storage unit (monthly fee), and bike storage room. Conveniently located within walking distance to the Italian Market, Avenue of the Arts, Passyunk Square and some of Philadelphia’s top restaurants, boutique shopping, a variety of name brand commercial stores, public transportation and more. Easy access to major highways, sports complexes, and Philadelphia International Airport. Schedule your tour today and come see what living in the heart of one of Philadelphia’s heavily sought-after neighborhoods could offer you!

title: Center City Philadelphia Apts Near Rittenhouse Sq Be a part of history
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃ‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. title: $1800 / Modern 2 bed 2.5 bath Point Breeze house avail. Dec 15th
description:
$1800 / 2 BR / 2.5 BA Modern 2 bed 2.5 bath Point Breeze house available Dec 15th
Modern and beautifully-kept 2 bed 2.5 bath townhouse available for rent beginning 12/15/2022 in the Point Breeze neighborhood of South Philly. Perfect for a single renter, a couple, roommates, or new family on a quiet block.
Property features:
- First floor spacious open-concept living room, dining room, convenient half bathroom, and kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and quartz countertops. The back door opens into a private patio area perfect for grilling or hanging out.
- Second floor opens into a guest bedroom with a full bathroom and plenty of built-in closet storage space, and a master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, large windows and a beautiful wood accent wall.
- A large unfinished basement provides plenty of room for storage, and includes an energy-efficient washer and dryer.
- Easy on-street parking (no permit needed)
Location:
- A short 1.5-mile walk from Center City, Rittenhouse Square and Passyunk Avenue as well as delicious local staples like El Mezcal Cantina, Community, On Point Bistro, and Dock Street Brewery.
- Two blocks away from the children and pet-friendly Wharton Square Park with a full playground, dog park area, and tennis courts.
- Convenient access to 76E/W, Walt Whitman bridge, and Philadelphia airport as well as to University city hospitals and schools including UPenn, Drexel, and USP.
- Public transportation (SEPTA) convenient into Center City via bus routes.
First month's rent and a one-month security deposit will be due at or prior to lease signing. 12 month lease. Pets are conditional on owner's approval. Tenant responsible for all utilities including water, gas, electricity, cable/internet. The owner lives close by and is very responsive to renters' needs or concerns.
Serious inquiries only.

title: Beautiful 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo in the Graduate Hospital
description:
Beautiful 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo in the Graduate Hospital area. The sleek exterior of this property will intrigue you to find what's behind the doors. What you will find is a stunning newly renovated unit complete with hardwood floors throughout; 3 nice sized bedrooms; a washer and dryer and 2 full bathrooms beautifully designed with marble floors, all new fixtures, and full tubs.
The brand new well-lit kitchen has a tiled backsplash and is fully equipped with all stainless-steel appliances. The kitchen leads to a large, quiet, back patio area perfect for summer barbecues.
Access to all major transportation channels makes travel very convenient. You can walk almost anywhere in this lovely neighborhood; from great coffee shops, fine dining, several playgrounds, and Lincoln Square that will have Sprouts Grocery Store and Target. You're less than 10 minutes distance from Rittenhouse. Make your appointment today!
Listing courtesy of Compass Pennsylvania LLC.

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home, Package Room, Dog Spa, Near Stores
description:
The studio apartment home at 2512 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor (of 26 floors) features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street and South Philadelphia. Be the first to enjoy a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom! This kitchen will be fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home will have wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Venditore by Giordano, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Bella Turka, Ritual Shoppe, Tselaine, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, Banana Republic Factory, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Via Locusta, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, Pizzeria Vetri, Marathon on the Square, Veda, The Love, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Bluestone Lane. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro from El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a slice of cake at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop for produce and flowers at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There are many banks in the neighborhood, including TD Bank in the building. This building has the best location!

* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.

* Sauna

* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge desk staff
* 24/7 on-site emergency maintenance
* Laundry room featuring a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.

* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 25th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large south-facing windows
* Chancellor Street/South Philadelphia view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)

title: Behold this 3BR Beaut
description: Make sure to check out this light and bright MOVE-IN ready 2 story home located on a 0.25 acre lot on a quiet street in West Bristol.  As you walk into the front door, you are welcomed into the living room with the electric fireplace, a great place to spend time with guests.  Off the living room, is a large dining room and a completely remodeled brand new kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, island and two large pantries offering very much needed storage space. The home features 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, a full basement and a very convenient mud room. New modern laminated flooring throughout the house, brand new 2022 Central A/C and Heating Systems as well as all the interior walls repainted to perfection. Fully fenced rear yard and large patio offer lots of privacy and enough room for entertainment. Both recently redone driveways provide enough parking space for almost 10 cars. The home is also conveniently located close to the local shopping, restaurants, parks, playgrounds, schools, AMF Bristol Pike Lanes bowling, Bucks County Community College and Croydon Regional Trenton train station.
